title: See the White House East Room demolition underway for Trump's ballroom
shortDescription: Workers demolished the East Wing's facade of the White House as part of President Donald Trump's plan to build a ballroom.

title: Demolition for Trump's new ballroom begins
shortDescription: Cranes were spotted near the White House as the next steps to President Trump's $200 million, 90,000-square-foot expansion of the East Wing begins.

title: White House ballroom project kicks off with East Wing demolition
shortDescription: Trump said during an event in the East Room on Oct. 20 that the ballroom construction work began earlier in the day.

title: What was Trump's response to 'No Kings' protests?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump responded to the massive 'No Kings' protests across the country with AI generated videos.

title: US appeals court lets Trump send troops to Portland
shortDescription: The 9th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals granted DOJ's request to put on hold a judge's order blocking the deployment while a legal challenge plays out.

title: Judge to block Trump move nixing 'gender ideology' from sex ed lessons
shortDescription: US Judge Ann Aiken in Oregon said she intends to issue a preliminary injunction at the behest of 16 states and the District of Columbia.

title: Trump signs rare earths deal with Australia
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Australia's PM Anthony Albanese signed a rare earths deal to secure supply as China tightens control globally.

title: Trump threatens to 'eradicate' Hamas if it doesn't uphold ceasefire
shortDescription: President Trump threatened to "eradicate" Hamas if it continues to violate a ceasefire the US helped broker between the militant group and Israel.

title: Trump says 'fantastic' trade deal with China will end tariff disputes
shortDescription: Trump predicted he would reach a 'fantastic' trade deal with China's President Xi Jinping, despite disputes about tariffs and rare earths.

title: Trump threatens Hamas with 'eradication'
shortDescription: Trump said Hamas must be "good" or face eradication as the Israel-Hamas ceasefire teeters after airstrikes.

title: 'Dumbest thing I ever wrote': Senate candidate talks old Reddit posts
shortDescription: In his video addressing the posts, Graham Platner said the comments were made during “an earlier part of” his life, and he no longer agrees with them.

title: Will Eric Trump run for office? He responds in 'Under Siege' book talk
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's son Eric Trump spoke on his political future at his book signing for 'Under Siege.' See his response.

title: Government shutdown latest: Senate rejects funding deal
shortDescription: The federal government shutdown rolled on to its 20th day on Monday as a resolution remains elusive amid a bitter stalemate in Congress.

title: Israel-Hamas ceasefire still intact, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump confirms Israel-Hamas ceasefire still holds after deadly Gaza airstrikes kill 26 Palestinians.

title: Trump's Gaza deal hangs in the balance. Can Vance save it?
shortDescription: JD Vance, Donald Trump's top messenger, traveled to Israel to try and prevent the collapse of the ceasefire between Netanyahu and Hamas.

title: ¿Qué revela la protesta ‘Sin Reyes’? Miles se manifiestan contra las políticas de Trump
shortDescription: Más de 2,500 protestas ‘No Kings’ unieron a millones el 18 de octubre en defensa de la democracia, los derechos y la libertad ante el poder presidencial.

title: FBI investigates hunting stand with sight line of Air Force One, Trump
shortDescription: The FBI launched an investigation into a hunting stand with a sight line of where President Donald Trump exits Air Force One in Palm Beach, Florida.

title: Trump slams Colombia's president after he accuses U.S. of murder
shortDescription: The United States has launched military strikes on seven suspected drug trafficking vessels since September, killing at least 32 people.

title: Zelenskyy says Trump needs to apply 'more pressure' with Putin
shortDescription: Ukraine's president left DC without the missiles he hoped for, but he said he's 'ready' to attend Trump's proposed U.S.-Russia summit in Budapest.

title: Trump shares videos of himself wearing a crown after 'No Kings' protests
shortDescription: In one video the president shared on social media, Trump wears a crown and flies a fighter jet with "King Trump" written on it.
